UniprotID	P78382
Accession	P78382;Q5W1L8
EntryName	S35A1_HUMAN
ProteinName	CMP-sialic acid transporter (CMP-SA-Tr) (CMP-Sia-Tr) (CST) (Solute carrier family 35 member A1)
GeneName	SLC35A1
Length	337
Function	Transports CMP-sialic acid from the cytosol into the Golgi apparatus, functioning as an antiporter that exchanges CMP-sialic acid for CMP (PubMed:12682060, PubMed:15576474, PubMed:23873973). Binds both CMP-sialic acid and free CMP, but has higher affinity for free CMP (By similarity). Also able to exchange CMP-sialic acid for AMP and UMP (PubMed:12682060). Also mediates the transport of CDP-ribitol (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus membrane; Golgi apparatus
Disorder	0.1028,0.0327,0.0483,0.0275,0.0174,0.0143,0.0107,0.0108,0.0096,0.0095,0.0120,0.0099,0.0095,0.0095,0.0073,0.0057,0.0042,0.0040,0.0037,0.0032,0.0032,0.0042,0.0046,0.0046,0.0064,0.0090,0.0117,0.0198,0.0253,0.0473,0.0356,0.0194,0.0163,0.0205,0.0275,0.0380,0.0473,0.0543,0.0294,0.0287,0.0398,0.0817,0.0473,0.0433,0.0424,0.0223,0.0130,0.0089,0.0085,0.0065,0.0060,0.0057,0.0057,0.0074,0.0076,0.0080,0.0079,0.0090,0.0119,0.0113,0.0198,0.0198,0.0096,0.0136,0.0198,0.0191,0.0191,0.0356,0.0749,0.0851,0.0851,0.0483,0.0948,0.1554,0.2224,0.2224,0.2224,0.1349,0.0780,0.0817,0.0799,0.0799,0.0454,0.1251,0.1184,0.0851,0.0531,0.0506,0.0356,0.0198,0.0184,0.0313,0.0631,0.0483,0.0380,0.0148,0.0094,0.0076,0.0075,0.0102,0.0108,0.0108,0.0117,0.0138,0.0100,0.0078,0.0076,0.0100,0.0109,0.0141,0.0127,0.0127,0.0081,0.0076,0.0062,0.0079,0.0093,0.0148,0.0148,0.0151,0.0104,0.0101,0.0109,0.0075,0.0075,0.0064,0.0086,0.0133,0.0136,0.0123,0.0115,0.0191,0.0115,0.0191,0.0115,0.0134,0.0111,0.0113,0.0069,0.0066,0.0065,0.0066,0.0057,0.0070,0.0073,0.0088,0.0086,0.0062,0.0061,0.0044,0.0060,0.0066,0.0058,0.0079,0.0068,0.0099,0.0141,0.0100,0.0100,0.0125,0.0184,0.0341,0.0618,0.0967,0.0518,0.0463,0.0424,0.0341,0.0555,0.0405,0.0380,0.0281,0.0130,0.0130,0.0092,0.0073,0.0057,0.0056,0.0070,0.0058,0.0064,0.0059,0.0045,0.0032,0.0018,0.0027,0.0038,0.0030,0.0033,0.0033,0.0037,0.0050,0.0060,0.0089,0.0102,0.0092,0.0094,0.0092,0.0095,0.0102,0.0113,0.0143,0.0108,0.0099,0.0097,0.0184,0.0157,0.0093,0.0084,0.0091,0.0093,0.0066,0.0059,0.0055,0.0042,0.0032,0.0032,0.0042,0.0056,0.0054,0.0045,0.0069,0.0049,0.0060,0.0092,0.0151,0.0153,0.0089,0.0084,0.0087,0.0119,0.0076,0.0120,0.0095,0.0067,0.0067,0.0070,0.0064,0.0051,0.0036,0.0024,0.0020,0.0016,0.0023,0.0017,0.0016,0.0015,0.0011,0.0013,0.0020,0.0027,0.0021,0.0023,0.0017,0.0024,0.0024,0.0032,0.0044,0.0069,0.0062,0.0073,0.0117,0.0194,0.0120,0.0120,0.0143,0.0113,0.0095,0.0120,0.0115,0.0082,0.0059,0.0075,0.0102,0.0093,0.0080,0.0115,0.0082,0.0064,0.0044,0.0041,0.0048,0.0036,0.0037,0.0
